Name: Lens Life
About the game: The Visual Novel “ Lens Life ” will present an exquisite short story for players: Your upstairs house is rented to sisters, and as the landlord, you have already installed cameras of various angles in the room.By searching the items under the lens,Understand the personality and life habits of the two sisters,Enjoy the secret of observing the lives of sisters. One day, you found that the sister encountered an emergency at home,and your actions may influence the direction of things.What choice will you make?
Meta Title: Lens Life: Aug 10, 2020, Zenox and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lens Life? Check out the release date (Aug 10, 2020), developer insights from Zenox, and a complete game summary.
